oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artstravaganza
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (gray and red on white) announcing Artstravaganza featuring Dance on February 19, Theatre on February 20, and Film Video on February 21 at the Darkhorse Theatre and Untitled's Glow Show at the Pub of Love Ballroom on February 19. Poster features a metal photoplate of a mouth.
